channel.title: Comments on: Stay
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I agree: There's been an influx of intelligent films out there. Special acclaim has been given to the trifecta of excellent films by Hispanic directors: Babel, Children of Men, and Pan's Labyrinth. They are all at the top of their game right now.
item.content:encoded: I agree: There’s been an influx of intelligent films out there. Special acclaim has been given to the trifecta of excellent films by Hispanic directors: Babel, Children of Men, and Pan’s Labyrinth. They are all at the top of their game right now.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: I've never heard of Stay at all. I'll have to check it out. Is it just me, or is there a glut of interesting things out in the theater at the moment? It's a relief after the drought of last year....
item.content:encoded: I’ve never heard of Stay at all. I’ll have to check it out. Is it just me, or is there a glut of interesting things out in the theater at the moment? It’s a relief after the drought of last year….

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: The script got picked up for quite the wad of cash, but the movie didn't do so well. Not sure if this was a function of advertising or the time of year it came out. I read half of the script, but I still haven't seen the movie. Children of Man has had a thumbs up from everyone I know who's seen it. Going to have to save my pennies to go see it myself:)
item.content:encoded: The script got picked up for quite the wad of cash, but the movie didn’t do so well. Not sure if this was a function of advertising or the time of year it came out. I read half of the script, but I still haven’t seen the movie. Children of Man has had a thumbs up from everyone I know who’s seen it. Going to have to save my pennies to go see it myself:)
